DOC.criteria: Age 1645 year History one ankle sprain Scoring least 85 % Foot Ankle Ability Measure ( FAAM ) Sport least 3 Modified Ankle Instability Instrument ( AII ) . At least 5° ankle dorsiflexion asymmetry compare contralateral limb OR ankle dorsiflexion ROM le 21° Lower extremity injury surgery within past 6 month ( include lateral ankle sprain ) Diagnosed ankle osteoarthritis History ankle surgery involve intraarticular fixation Medical condition would contraindications mobilization/manipulation and/or transcranial magnetic stimulation , include cardiac pacemaker , metal implant head , current pregnancy , neurological disorder , recent use stimulant medication know low seizure threshold , personal family history seizure
